sentence.Network_en: He took up his brush and went tranquilly to work.
sentence.Network_cn: 他拿起刷子,一声不响地干了起来.

sentence.Network_en: The evening was closing down tranquilly.
sentence.Network_cn: 暮色正在静悄悄地笼罩下来.

sentence.Network_en: The man resumed tranquilly, " Put me in the stable. "
sentence.Network_cn: 那人和颜悦色地说: “ 把我安顿在马房里就是了. ”
